channel.title: Wireshark on Policy to Packets
channel.description: Recent content in Wireshark on Policy to Packets

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - Disclose The Agent
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing an SMTP PCAP to identify leaked credentials, decode Base64 authentication data, extract and reconstruct an email attachment from network traffic, and verify file integrity through hashing.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - Http Basic Auth.
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing a PCAP file to identify HTTP GET requests, enumerate server and client details from HTTP headers, and decode Basic Authentication credentials using Wireshark and CyberChef.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - Shellshock Attack
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing Shellshock attack activity in a PCAP file using Wireshark, identifying the target server details and the injected command.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - Port Scan Activity
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing port scan activity in a PCAP file using Wireshark, identifying the scanning host, discovered systems, and network indicators.
